CustomField.description: Year and quarter of the meeting report.
CustomField.formula: IF (MONTH(Date__c)<4 , TEXT(YEAR(Date__c)) &"-Q1" , IF (MONTH(Date__c)<7 , TEXT(YEAR(Date__c )) &"-Q2" , IF (MONTH(Date__c)<10 , TEXT(YEAR(Date__c )) &"-Q3" ,TEXT(YEAR(Date__c )) &"-Q4")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Year and quarter of the meeting report.
CustomField.label: Year & Quarter
